tags.name: shell
tags.description:
Executes a command as if by the user from the terminal, i.e., `$ echo example` and shows its output in ```sh
{output}
```
 The language and other properties can be customised via the arguments: command, children, language, err.

attributes.name: command
attributes.description: The command to execute, such as `echo`.

attributes.name: children
attributes.description: Pass arguments each on new line.

attributes.name: err
attributes.description: Boolean, whether to print STDERR instead of STDOUT.
